meanings.definition: A person or group that competes with another.
meanings.sent1: In the race, the two corrivals sprinted towards the finish line.
meanings.sent2: The corrivals in the market constantly strive to outdo each other.
meanings.sent3: The corrivals in the spelling bee had a friendly rivalry.
meanings.sent4: The corrivals in the business world battled for the top spot.
meanings.sent5: The corrivals' intense competition made the match exciting to watch.

meanings.definition: To compete with someone or something.
meanings.sent1: She corrivals with her sister in every game they play.
meanings.sent2: Teams corrival fiercely to win the championship.
meanings.sent3: The siblings corrival for the last piece of cake.
meanings.sent4: Businesses corrival for the attention of customers.
meanings.sent5: The athletes corrival for the gold medal with determination.
